ygData.msgSnippet: ... Prowl walks up to Iron Raptor. He picks up her thoughts, and instantly knows what Chromedome was there for and what was on Iron Raptor s mind. -Don t

::Prowl::

Prowl walks up to Iron Raptor. He picks up her thoughts, and 
instantly knows what Chromedome was there for and what was on Iron 
Raptor's mind.

-Don't worry, love, you're a greath leader.- He thinks to her, trying 
to reassure her. -Without you getting that cease fire, we could all 
be dead right now.-

He salutes her as he stops, and then steps aside and points to 
Symphony. "Commander, this is Symphony. He's a Maximal that's come to 
join us."

-I hope you don't mind me being so formal, love.- He thinks to her 
while speaking his introduction of Symphony outloud, -But a commander 
should have her title used.-



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> Sorry for forgetting to reply to you, Alloran.
> 
> * Iron Raptor looked up from the intercom as she heard a voice, her 
eyes 
> falling upon Chromedome and her annoyed expression disappearing 
completely.
> She shook her leg roughly and slipped it out of Snow Tech's grasp, 
standing 
> straight but listening carefully to Chromedome.
> She wouldn't admit it but if her flesh had been any paler someone 
could have 
> seen her blush slightly from the compliments which he was saying 
about her.
> It was nice to have someone say something good about her after 
Liono's 
> sayings. But she knew that she wasn't as good as they said she was.
> She had been away while her beast mode had taken controle, and she 
had only 
> returned while the battle had happened. A real leader wouldn't do 
that.
> But people learned from the past and she had.*
> 
> " Well, I don't know if I'm as great as all that but your offer 
sounds 
> pretty good to me. The more skilled warriors we have the better."
> 
> * Iron Raptor held out a hand.*
> 
> " I accept."
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
>
